name: Panda Chronicles
description:
Short 2D platformer game that involves playing as a panda completing a quest requested by the king. Exploring two different dimensions to reclaim the treasures from Malus to restore the faith in Bonum. Beware of your actions in Malus because it may affect the future of Bonum.

  • Discover 3 different endings based on your action in-game!
  • Potential to unlock new abilities through a shopkeeper.
  • Collect several achievements
